attributes.action: let us remove MPs tainted by the expenses scandal via a General Election NOW
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
This parliament now has no credibility and has shown itself to be populated by many self-serving parasites with no moral sense.

The electorate needs the opportunity to show its distaste for the present encumbents and therefore needs a General Election NOW.

rejection.details: The conduct of MPs is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
